actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966, to provide that the standard time shall be advanced 1 hour during the period beginning on the first Sunday in June and ending on the last Sunday in August of each year.

summary.text: Provides that effective May 31, 1975, the standard time, under the Uniform Time Act of 1966, shall be advanced one hour during the period beginning on the first Sunday in June and ending on the last Sunday in August of each year. (Amends 15 U.S.C. 260a(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966, to provide that the standard time shall be advanced 1 hour during the period beginning on the first Sunday in June and ending on the last Sunday in August of each year.
